Class Fragment_Filters

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities.Fragment_Filters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, View.OnClickListener, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class Fragment_Filters
extends Fragment
implements View.OnClickListener
    This fragment contains the filtering options for the issues.
    Author:
    Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).
